fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Climate Action

organisation_name: Association Internationale des Utilisateurs de Fils de filaments Artificiels et Synthétiques et de Soie naturelle (A.I.U.F.F.A.S.S.)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
AIUFFASS is the representative body for the European Synthetic & the Artificial Filament industry as well as the Silk Industry. 
The association represents, promotes and serves the interests of the European industrial users of those raw materials.
relevant_communication: Apart from the usual monitoring and lobbying activities, we organize each year a meeting in Brussels and an annual Congress in Europe.
